portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: This website was built to showcase my talents and ability to learn new languages and skills. This was the first time I had used Pug, Grunt, Firebase, and PM2.

data-table.title: Data Table
data-table.description: This website was created for a job application to demonstrate my ability to build a data table from scratch. Certain user stories and requirements had to be met which can be viewed on the website.

UFSports.title: Ultimate Fantasy Sports
UFSports.description: Originally, line ups were being tracked through messages and stats/standings were being calculated by hand. Quickly realizing there must be a better way, this website was born. Over the past 8 years, it's gone through 6 different redesigns along with hundreds (maybe thousands) of improvements and changes.

MarshTree.title: Marsh Tree and Landscaping
MarshTree.description: One of the first websites I ever created. Originally it used just static HTML and CSS. I recently refactored the code to use Node, Webpack, Pug, and SASS. I plan on giving it a better design and to make it mobile friendly.

Salesform.title: Sales Form
Salesform.description: I found a college student asking for assistance with this challenge online. It was due the next day so I reached out and assisted him. After pulling an all nighter, he was able to complete the project and turn it in on time!

Yoriwine.title: Yori Wine Cellars
Yoriwine.description: Assisted the owner with the set up and layout of the website for his wine business in North East, PA. Feel free to take a look and maybe order some delicious wine!

CookieJar.title: My Cookie Jar and More
CookieJar.description: My Cookie Jar and More was meant to be an online ordering hub for a lady who had a dream of opening her own bakery. Due to strict NY state laws, the bakery and website were short lived. Currently rebuilding this website to be hosted on my server.

comhs.title: Children of Mary Homeschoolers
comhs.description: COMHS is a Catholic home schooling group located in Western NY. I custom built the Joomla theme and set up a vBulletin forum for them. In turn, this saved them hundreds of dollars per year from their previous hosting and developer costs.

TicTacToe.title: Tic Tac Toe
TicTacToe.description: Created for my C++ college final in 2012. Recently refactored the code to improve and reduce logic.

Blackjack.title: Blackjack
Blackjack.description: Built in college for my Java final back in 2012. The requirements were to draw the cards, allow hit/stay, and determine the winner. I've since expanded the functionality to start a new game, added color, allow aces to be 11 or 1, and completely refactored the code base.

BigFishTri.title: Big Fish Triathlon
BigFishTri.description: Worked with a board of directors to design and develop a website for a new triathlon in Chautauqua County. The project has since been taken over and redesigned.

Century21.title: Century 21 Turner Brokers
Century21.description: This was one of the first projects I ever worked on for a local company in Chautauqua County, NY.

59LucyLane.title: 59 Lucy Lane
59LucyLane.description: I took this site over from another developer and gave it a slight make over. Although my version of the site is no longer live, the site and legend of Lucille Ball lives on.
